word:
Chap. 145 - Diary Entry

                        Wednesday, July 19, 1893 

     Lost two hours' sleep during the night. Waken in morning at half past four. I thank my heavenly Father that I am feeling refreshed in body and in mind. I commit myself every morning to the Lord, in earnest prayer that He will control my mind through the day. I plead with God that through the imparted 
                                                                           1196
grace of Christ I may have every thought brought into captivity to Jesus Christ.
